```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
colnames(Spotify_data)
```

```{r}
Spotify_data <- read.csv("~/Desktop/GitHub/Sta-141C/New_Spspotify_chart_song_ranks.csv")
```

```{r}
trim_data = Spotify_data %>%
  mutate(artist_names = str_trim(artist_names), WeekDate = as.Date(WeekDate)) %>% 
  filter(artist_names == "Bad Bunny")
```

```{r}
aa <- ggplot(data = trim_data,aes(x= WeekDate ,y =streams,color = track_name)) + geom_line() +theme(legend.position = "none")
ggplotly(aa)
```
